Summary: Sphere like object, colored flame orange
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Wheaton
There were no other sightings in Wheaton on or around January 22nd 2011
divs: sighting details saw a sphere like object that had an orange glow to it. this object was moving on a semi straight line from what appeared to be west to east. object would slow down shortly, then move back to its original speed. was moving for approximately 2 mins...... then disappeared from the sky. was witnessed by myself and my friend\co-worker. we both agreed that it looked like nothing we had ever seen before.
